response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its worth to us, I propose a price of $12,000 for you to consider. This offer not only ensures a fair exchange but also allows you to benefit from the high-quality features and benefits this product provides. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
